means: 噪音爵士乐（英国的一种摇滚乐）

entry.tran: (20 世纪 50 年代流行的一种用家用物品、吉他和鼓等演奏的)噪音爵士乐，即兴摇滚乐
entry.def: Skiffle is a type of music, popular in the 1950s, played by a small group using household objects as well as guitars and drums.

means.word_mean: 1. a style of popular music in the 1950s; based on American folk music and played on guitars and improvised percussion instruments
